p: Saturated and unsaturated fatty acids were identified in the RPLO, which are shown in Table 1. The determination of the chemical composition revealed that RPLO comprises saturated (SFA) and unsaturated (UFA) fatty acids, with a slightly higher SFA content. Palmitic (16:0), myristic (14:0) and stearic (18:0) acids were the major SFAs. Oleic (18:1, ω-9), palmitoleic (16:1, ω-7), and linoleic (18:2, ω-6) acids were identified as UFAs, representing the omega-6, -7 and -9 families, respectively.
